last_episode_to_air.name: Dalmatian Vacation (3): Dearly Beloved
last_episode_to_air.overview: The pups try their best to help Roger find Anita, who is held captive by alien cultists who refuse to let her leave until their Shaggy-Green Messenger comes for them.

name: 101 Dalmatians: The Series
overview: After foiling Cruella DeVil's plot to make a fur coat with the puppies' skins, the Dearly Family (Roger and Anita Dearly, Nanny, Pongo, Perdita, their 15 birth puppies and 84 adopted puppies) move to a new farm home in the country. Join Pongo and Perdy's pups, brave Lucky, tubby Rolly and Cadpig the runt, together with their chicken friend Spot, as they defend their new home from Cruella DeVil (Anita's boss and now new neighbor), continually get in and out of trouble, sneak into Grutely, and have all sorts of crazy adventures around the farm. Also along for the fun is Tripod, Patch, Two-Tone, Wizzer, Dipstick, Mooch, and the rest of their barnyard friends.

episodes.name: Home is Where the Bark Is
episodes.overview: When Roger and Anita's house proves to be too much trouble for the 101 dogs they own, they move to a new farm. Lucky, Cadpig, and Rolly, however, prefer the city life and are determined to return to their old home. Then, Cruella keeps the pups hostage in the old city house and forces Roger and Anita to give over the farm.

episodes.name: He Followed Me Home
episodes.overview: A circus elephant wanders onto the Dearly Farm, which gives Cruella the idea that the Dearlys will be forced to sell the farm because their deed prohibits them from having any pets other than their 101 Dalmatians and the animals already part of the farm.

episodes.name: Love 'Em and Flea 'Em
episodes.overview: Lucky wishes to attend a dance with Two-Tone, but ends up with fleas, and he tries to get rid of them. However, Mooch wants to make Lucky fail so Two-Tone will be his girlfriend again, so he tries to spoil Lucky's friends' attempts at getting rid of them.

episodes.name: Howl Noon
episodes.overview: Lt. Pug's old bully rival, Persian Pete, comes back to haunt him at exactly noon, and Cadpig is determined to help him face his fear by hypnotizing him into a trance.

episodes.name: Easy on the Lies
episodes.overview: When Rolly traps himself into hearing the Colonel tell a story he has heard very often, Lucky stretches the truth to try to get him out of it, which lands them all in trouble by forcing them to sneak into Cruella's dwelling.

episodes.name: Two for the Show
episodes.overview: Lucky and Rolly compete on the game show Squeal of Fortune to win a bone autographed by Thunderbolt. Meanwhile, Cruella enters Scorch and Vendella into the show as well to advertise her new fashion pet wear. Then, Steven the alligator arrives and causes havoc at the show's end.

episodes.name: An Officer and a Gentledog
episodes.overview: Lucky and Tripod compete to become Top Dog of Lt. Pug's Bark Brigade on the "Obstacle Course of Unspeakable Pain and Agony." The competition becomes more and more heated as the obstacle course goes on.

episodes.name: Bad to the Bone
episodes.overview: Rolly joins Mooch's gang after faking a fight with Cydne the Snake, although he dumps his true friends in the process. However, later Cydne comes to confront Rolly to force him to tell the truth.

episodes.name: Southern Fried Cruella
episodes.overview: Cruella makes her latest plans using the means of pollution, by being given responsibility of the farm while Roger and Anita are away and fooling the landlord into allowing her to build factories around the farm.

episodes.name: Swine Song
episodes.overview: Rolly believes he has fallen in love with Dumpling and attempts to impress her. However, Dumpling doesn't seem interested in Rolly, causing him to lose hope. Lucky, Cadpig, and Spot attempt to help Rolly make an impression on Dumpling.

episodes.name: Watch for Falling Idols
episodes.overview: A Thunderbolt executive orders the Dearly Farm be used for the next episode of Thunderbolt. Lucky is overjoyed at the news. Despite this, when Lucky learns Thunderbolt doesn't do all his own stunts, which causes him to lose faith in his hero. Meanwhile, Cruella attempts to play a part in the production.

episodes.name: The High Price of Fame
episodes.overview: Spot embarrasses herself while the pups videotape her every move and submit it to Stupendously Embarrassing Home Videos, causing her to sign a deal with Swamp Rat to clear her name.

episodes.name: The Great Cat Invasion
episodes.overview: Fed up of hearing about Lt. Pug's fictional cat invasion, Lucky devises a plan to get him off their backs. However, the pups later discover Cruella's latest plot and realize that Lt. Pug may have been telling the truth after all.

episodes.name: No Train, No Gain
episodes.overview: After seeing a boy billionaire ask for a specific railway car, Cruella tries to get rich quick by stealing the one on the Dearly's farm. However, the pups and the Colonel attempt to prevent Cruella from getting her hands on it, causing them to embark on a wild mountain chase.

episodes.name: Rolly's Egg-Celent Adventure
episodes.overview: Rolly baby-sits Spot's mother's eggs, which Scorch tries to steal. When the chicks hatch, they believe Rolly is their mother.

episodes.name: Wild Chick Chase
episodes.overview: Spot has to baby-sit a chick, Peeps, when she really would rather go for a swim. She decides to find out if she can do both. However, Peeps the chick loves milk and keeps sneaking off to find more of it, keeping Spot on her toes.

episodes.name: The Dogs of DeVil
episodes.overview: After watching a soap opera, Cadpig jumps to the conclusion that Cruella telling Anita to work on a Saturday and her obedience to that order means Roger and Anita are divorcing.

episodes.name: Dog's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Lucky gets a new friend called Blaze, who has just arrived on the farm, but after a while, Rolly becomes jealous of him.

episodes.name: A Christmas Cruella
episodes.overview: Cruella turns into Scrooge on Christmas and fires Anita. When Cruella hits her head she dreams that the pups take her on a trip through time. She goes to the past, present, and future.

episodes.name: Out to Launch
episodes.overview: The Pups sneak into cruella's Rocket plan to launch the DeVil NCCA spaceship to destroy the earth.

episodes.name: Prophet and Loss
episodes.overview: Cadpig plays along with the others and the farm animals as she thinks she's psychic.

episodes.name: You Slipped a Disk
episodes.overview: The Trio chases after Scorch when he steals a diskette that Roger ordered Lucky to keep out of Cruella's hands.

episodes.name: Chow About That?
episodes.overview: The trio try to figure out a way to break into the silo when they miss lunch.

episodes.name: Tic Track Toe
episodes.overview: The Main Pups help their idol Go-Go the greyhound when a racetrack accident leaves him afraid of bunnies.

episodes.name: Lucky All-Star
episodes.overview: Convinced that he is Roger's favorite, Lucky bitterly competes with Tripod over whom Roger will enter in a bone-digging contest.

episodes.name: Shake, Rattle, and Woof
episodes.overview: Cruella dupes the Dearlys into signing onto a terrible variety series where they'll forfeit the farm if they quit.

episodes.name: Cadpig Behind Bars
episodes.overview: Thrown into the pound, Cadpig tries to help her fellow inmates but drives them up the wall instead.

episodes.name: Leisure Lawsuit
episodes.overview: Cruella fakes an injury on Dearly property so that she can sue them for the farm.

episodes.name: Purred It Through the Grapevine
episodes.overview: The Main Pups get an emergency Bark Brigade message but don't know how to translate it.

episodes.name: Our Own Digs
episodes.overview: The Main Pups establish their own place in a haystack, but Pug steals it from them.

episodes.name: Goose Pimples
episodes.overview: While on a midnight march in the woods, each Main Pup seems to disappear into the hands of the monstrous Lockjaw

episodes.name: Two Faces of Anita
episodes.overview: Cruella has face surgery to look like Anita, because Anita wins the award Cruella wants.

episodes.name: The Fungus Among Us
episodes.overview: Cruella steals mushrooms from under the farm because they smeel good and tries to use them as a new perfume.

episodes.name: Market Mayham
episodes.overview: The Main Pups sneak into the supermarket to make sure that the humans buy Kanine Krunchies instead of Anymutt dogfood.

episodes.name: Lucky to be Alone
episodes.overview: When Lucky wants to live alone, Pongo and Perdita send him to live with Perdita's rich cousins Coco and Beamer Vandercreme.

episodes.name: Four Stories Up
episodes.overview: When their favorite show is delayed due to Cruella the pups imagine on how the show ended.

episodes.name: It's a Swamp Thing
episodes.overview: The Main Pups first meet the swamp denizens when they defy the Colonel's orders and explore the swamp.

episodes.name: Roll Out the Pork Barrel
episodes.overview: Rolly becomes Ed Pig's protege when he has a fallout with the other pups and Ed gets fed up with Dumpling.

episodes.name: Alive N' Chicken
episodes.overview: Spot mistakenly believes she has only until nightfall to live. Knowing better, the Trio takes this as an opportunity to get her to live life to the fullest.

episodes.name: Prima Doggy
episodes.overview: Lucky wins a starring role in Cecil B. DeVil's latest Kanine Krunchies commercial.

episodes.name: You Say It's Your Birthday
episodes.overview: The Main Pups think the Dearlys are going to give them all away. Cruella thinks Anita is moonlighting for Ralphie St. Lowrent.

episodes.name: Oozy Does It
episodes.overview: The animals all join forces when Cruella dumps blue dye from her blue jeans factory into Hiccup Hole.

episodes.name: Barnboozled
episodes.overview: Cruella will take posession of the farm if she can maintain residence in the barn for 24 hours.

episodes.name: Citizen Canine
episodes.overview: Lucky runs for mayor so he can get rid of the rules at the farm.

episodes.name: Full Metal Pullet
episodes.overview: To get into the Bark Brigade, Lucky wants to throw Spot off his drill team, and lets Pug bully her around.

episodes.name: Dough the Right Thing
episodes.overview: The pups return to Cruella a purse full of money that they think is hers, but then have to retrieve the purse when it turns out to be Anita's instead.

episodes.name: Frisky Business
episodes.overview: The Main Pups steal Cruella's car to try to drive to a Kanine Krunchies tasting party in Stiffle.

episodes.name: Cadet of the Month
episodes.overview: Lucky's plan to earn paw merits by saving Pug's life goes horribly awry.

episodes.name: Valentine Daze
episodes.overview: Lonely Cruella thinks Roger's fancy valentine for Anita is for her instead, while Horace and Dumpling try to find love with a reluctant Nanny and Lucky.

episodes.name: Close but no Cigar
episodes.overview: The Main Pups try to get to the county fair when they miss the bus going there.

episodes.name: Invasion of the Doggy Snatchers
episodes.overview: When the Trio won't let Spot into the barn, a hen named Sal asserts that the pups have become possessed by aliens.

episodes.name: Smoke Detectors
episodes.overview: The Main Pups try to get Cruella to quit her smoking habit when she has to move in with the Dearlys.

episodes.name: Lobster Tale
episodes.overview: Cadpig liberates a lobster named Lance from his restaurant fish tank and tries to find a new home for him.

episodes.name: Double Dog Dare
episodes.overview: Lucky dares Spot to steal Cruella's sleeping mask while Cruella sleeps.

episodes.name: Mooove It On Over
episodes.overview: Cadpig's headstrong efforts to resolve a small dispute between the cows leads to disaster.

episodes.name: Shipwrecked
episodes.overview: Lucky and Cruellas pet, get stranded on a deserted island.

episodes.name: Mall Pups
episodes.overview: The trio go to the mall to see Thunder Bolt.

episodes.name: Shrewzle Watch
episodes.overview: Cruella claims to have spotted the rare solitary tree shrewzle on Dearly property. So the Dearly's must sell the farm to Cruella for her to convert it to a shrewzle sanctuary.

episodes.name: The Life You Save
episodes.overview: To Lucky's annoyance, Dumpling starts serving Lucky hand and foot when he inadvertently saves her life.

episodes.name: Spots and Shots
episodes.overview: Lucky hides in the DeVil manor when the vet visits to administer shots to the pups.

episodes.name: On the Lamb
episodes.overview: An adventure-hungry Lucky leads the others in a lambhunt for Lambo, a deranged lamb running amok in Grutley.

episodes.name: Treasure of Swamp Island
episodes.overview: The Main Pups compete against each other in a treasure hunt, but the treasure turns out to be just some jewels Cruella is hiding from an IRS agent.

episodes.name: Lord of the Termites
episodes.overview: The Main Pups have the run of the farm when they come home to find it evacuated so that Jasper and Horace can fumigate it for termites.

episodes.name: Fountain of Youth
episodes.overview: Cruella thinks the Dearlys' water can make people young again.

episodes.name: Walk a Mile in my Tracks
episodes.overview: Pug and Cornelia boast that each can do the other's job and then switch jobs to prove it.

episodes.name: Cruella World
episodes.overview: Lucky discovers that Cruella's new theme park is actually a front for an illegal oil-drilling operation.

episodes.name: Hail to the Chief
episodes.overview: Rolly doubts that he can live up to the legend of great grandfather Rolondo when the pups participate in a contest for the position of Chief Firedog.

episodes.name: Food for Thought
episodes.overview: P.H. DeVil uses Rolly's appetite to lure him into the animal testing lab of his Double Dip Ice Cream factory.

episodes.name: The Maltese Chicken
episodes.overview: Spot becomes Pullet Marlow, Private Chick and tries to catch the thief who stole Cornelia's new giant egg in this film noir parody.

episodes.name: Film Fatale
episodes.overview: Lucky talks the others into trying to sneak in the Cruellaplex to see ""Thunderbolt - The Movie"".

episodes.name: My Fair Chicken
episodes.overview: The trio helps Spot relearn how to act like a chicken in time for the Silver Egg Social. Jasper and Horace hunt for feathers for Cruella.

episodes.name: Snow Bounders
episodes.overview: The Main Pups stowaway on Roger and Pongo's winter camping trip but wind up stranded in woods with Cruella.

episodes.name: Gnaw or Never
episodes.overview: Rolly suddenly develops an insatiable desire to chew on expensive shoes, and Cruella schemes to use his addiction to bankrup the Dearly's.

episodes.name: Poison Ivy
episodes.overview: Cruella's seemingly innocent niece Ivy actually has an evil plan when she visits the Dearly farm.

episodes.name: Twelve Angry Pups
episodes.overview: Someone has stolen stuff from all the farm animals, and they blame Mooch for the thefts.

episodes.name: The Good-bye Chick
episodes.overview: Spot runs away when she can't fit in with the pups or her family.

episodes.name: Robo-Rolly
episodes.overview: Cruella downsizes Anita so that she'll then work for Ralphie. Then she has P.H. DeVil kidnap Rolly and replace him with a robot double to spy on Anita's work.

episodes.name: Splishing and Splashing
episodes.overview: Pongo and Perdita forbid the Main Pups from using Hiccup Hole when Lucky won't apologize to Lucy for splashing her.

episodes.name: Virtual Lucky
episodes.overview: Lucky and Cruella get trapped in a computer game Roger created.

episodes.name: Cupid Pups
episodes.overview: The Main Pups secretly help Cruella romance Baron Efrem Von Schnittkerdoodle so that she can marry him and move away.

episodes.name: The Artist Formerly Known as Spot
episodes.overview: Cruella's art critic friend Leticia judges some paint marks Spot makes as great art. So Spot becomes excited at the possibility that she might be a genius artist.

episodes.name: The Nose Knows
episodes.overview: Pug puts Rolly through a tough endurence test in an effort to get him kicked out of the Bark Brigade. But Rolly's expert tracking ability will save him.

episodes.name: K Is For Kibble
episodes.overview: Spot becomes Pullet Marlow again to find the culprit behind mysterious disappearances of kibble from the chow tower.

episodes.name: Humanitarian of the Year
episodes.overview: The pups remember times when Cruella was mean and tried to steal the farm.

episodes.name: Beauty Pageant Pandemonium
episodes.overview: The Main Pups thwart Ivy's attempts to beat Anita's cousin Amber in the Junior Miss Grutely Pageant by cheating.

episodes.name: Hog Tied
episodes.overview: Dumpling is bored, so she decides to join the pups' group despite the fact that they do not want her to, and she also causes them many problems.

episodes.name: Coup DeVil
episodes.overview: Cruella has a family reunion so they can figure out on ways to get the Dearlys farm.

episodes.name: Every Little Crooked Nanny
episodes.overview: Cruella disguises herself as housekeeper Cranny to find out about Anita's secret project for ""royal"" clients.

episodes.name: Cone Head
episodes.overview: Lucky cuts his head while doing a dare by Mooch. He has to wear a cone to prevent him from tearing at his stitches. Mooch and others constantly tease him.

episodes.name: Channels
episodes.overview: The Main Pups go to Grutely to help Anita while the other animals fight over what channel to watch.

episodes.name: Un-Lucky
episodes.overview: When Lucky's horseshoe spot pattern rubs off, he believes he has lost all his luck along with it. Meanwhile, Cruella tries to sabotage Roger's newest computer game.

episodes.name: The Making Of...
episodes.overview: The pups tell of how the show 101 Dalmatians begin.

episodes.name: Best of Show
episodes.overview: Spot helps out when the Dearly's enter the trio in a dog show against Cruella's new pet, Vendela.

episodes.name: Walk on the Wild Side
episodes.overview: Rolly, fed up with being taken for a sucker by Mooch's gang, joins forces with Swamp Rat to get even, but becomes mean in the process.

episodes.name: Horace and Jasper's Big Career Move
episodes.overview: At a job interview, Horace and Jasper recall their previous jobs in their own clip show.

episodes.name: DeVil-Age Elder
episodes.overview: While out on a picnic, the Dearly's and the Main Pups discover DeVilVille, the enchanted village that appears only once every 100 years.

episodes.name: Jurassic Bark
episodes.overview: Lucky stumbles upon CavePup, a 10000 year old prehistoric dog that he revives and tries to protect from Cruella and P.H.

episodes.name: My Fair Moochie
episodes.overview: Cadpig and Mooch fall in love, although Cadpig's only aim is to persuade him not to fight in a wrestling match against El Diablo. However, despite Cadpig's controlling of him, Lucky, Rolly, and Spot want him to fight, and attempt to help him get up to shape for the fight.

episodes.name: Dog Food Day Afternoon
episodes.overview: Cruella takes over the Kanine Krunchies brand of dog food and starts making it out of sawdust. Soon, however, Rolly discovers the plan and tries to stop it with the help of his friends.

episodes.name: Spot's Fairy God-Chicken
episodes.overview: Spot wishes she was a dog. Drumstick, her fairy god-chicken, shows up to grant her wish. Soon, however, Spot gets more than she bargained for when she discovers that being a dog has many disadvantages.

episodes.name: Good Neighbor Cruella
episodes.overview: A) P.H. DeVil splits Cruella's good side into a clone meant to improve her image.

episodes.name: Animal House Party
episodes.overview: While Pongo, Perdita, and the humans are away, Cadpig discovers she has PDS, and Swamp Rat takes over the house for his party. The pups, with Lt. Pug, try to drive him out.

episodes.name: Dalmatian Vacation (1): Road Warriors
episodes.overview: Roger plans a second honeymoon trip for him & Anita to renew their wedding vows. But the Dearlys wind up taking the 101 dalmatians and then Cruella along with them or Anita will be fired. Then Roger and Anita find out they aren't married.

episodes.name: Dalmatian Vacation (2): Cross-Country Calamity
episodes.overview: Cruella finds out that she can steal the farm away from the Dearlys if they don't get married in 48 hours. So Cruella comes up with stunts to keep them from getting to the church in time. Including tricking Roger into signing a contract to play baseball.

episodes.name: Dalmatian Vacation (3): Dearly Beloved
episodes.overview: The pups try their best to help Roger find Anita, who is held captive by alien cultists who refuse to let her leave until their Shaggy-Green Messenger comes for them.
